faqs.question: How does BiblioKit Blocks track component usage across my design files?
faqs.answer: BiblioKit Blocks connects to your Figma account via secure OAuth and automatically scans your design libraries and files to track component instances, usage frequency, and adoption patterns in real-time without manual setup.

faqs.question: Can I measure the ROI of my design system investment?
faqs.answer: Yes, BiblioKit Blocks provides comprehensive ROI reporting with quantifiable metrics including time savings, efficiency gains, component reuse rates, and productivity improvements that demonstrate clear business value to stakeholders.

faqs.question: What kind of analytics insights will I get about my components?
faqs.answer: You'll receive detailed analytics on component usage trends, adoption rates, over-used vs. under-used components, team collaboration patterns, and actionable recommendations for optimizing your design system performance.

faqs.question: Is my Figma data secure with BiblioKit Blocks?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We use enterprise-grade security with SOC 2 compliance, encrypted data transmission, and secure OAuth integration. Your design data is protected with the same security standards used by Fortune 500 companies.

faqs.question: How quickly can I see results after connecting my Figma account?
faqs.answer: Initial analytics appear within 24 hours of connecting your account. The platform continuously syncs with your Figma files to provide real-time insights and updated reports as your design system evolves.

faqs.question: How does AI Rename Variants understand my component structure?
faqs.answer: The plugin analyzes your component's properties, layer hierarchy, design patterns, and existing naming conventions to generate contextually appropriate names that match your design system standards.

faqs.question: Can I customize the naming patterns and conventions?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can configure custom naming rules, prefixes, suffixes, and patterns to match your team's specific design system guidelines and maintain consistency across all projects.

faqs.question: Is it safe to use on important design files?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. The plugin includes comprehensive undo functionality and tracks all changes, allowing you to safely revert any renaming operations if needed.

faqs.question: Does it work with existing design systems and component libraries?
faqs.answer: Yes, AI Rename Variants is designed to work with any Figma file structure and can learn from your existing naming patterns to maintain consistency with your current design system.

faqs.question: How many variants can it rename at once?
faqs.answer: The plugin can process hundreds of variants and layers simultaneously, making it perfect for large component libraries and complex design systems with extensive variant structures.
